test-case.name: artifactForFileResourceFileNameFoundTargetExistsButNotAssigned
test-case.description: Verify that the receive message contains a 404, if there is no distribution set assigned to the target

test-case.name: artifactForFileResourceArtifactIdFoundTargetExistsIsAssigned
test-case.description: Verify that the receive message contains a 200 and a artifact for the given artifact id

test-case.name: loginFailedBadCredentials
test-case.description: Verify that login fails if the given credential not match.

test-case.name: securityTokenIsNull
test-case.description: Tests a null message. This message is invalid and should not be requeued. Additional the receive message is null

test-case.name: artifactForFileResourceSoftwareModuleFilenameFoundTargetNotExists
test-case.description: Verify that the receive message contains a 404, if there is no existing target for the file resource

test-case.name: securityTokenTenantIsNull
test-case.description: Tenant in the message is null. This message is invalid and should not be requeued. Additional the receive message is null

test-case.name: artifactForFileResourceSHA1FoundByTargetIdTargetExistsButIsNotAssigned
test-case.description: Verify that the receive message contains a 404 code , if the distributionSet is not assigned to the target

test-case.name: wrongContentType
test-case.description: Tests wrong content type. This message is invalid and should not be requeued. Additional the receive message is null

test-case.name: artifactForFileResourceSHA1FoundTargetNotExists
test-case.description: Verify that the receive message contains a 404 code, if there is no existing target for the given controller id

test-case.name: targetTokenAuthentification
test-case.description: Artifact is downloaded anonymous as there is not target id or controller id assigned to the target.

test-case.name: securityTokenFileResourceIsNull
test-case.description: Target in the message is null.This message is invalid and should not requeued. Additional the receive message is null

test-case.name: anonymousAuthentification
test-case.description: Verify that the receive message contains a 200 code and a artifact without a controller id (anonymous enabled)

test-case.name: artifactForFileResourceFileNameNotFound
test-case.description: Verify that the receive message contains a 404, if there is no artifact to the given filename

test-case.name: artifactForFileResourceSHA1FoundTargetExistsButNotAssigned
test-case.description: Verify that the receive message contains a 404 code, if there is no existing artifact for the target

test-case.name: artifactForFileResourceSHA1FoundByTargetIdTargetExistsIsAssigned
test-case.description: Verify that the receive message contains a 200 code and a artifact for the existing target id

test-case.name: artifactForFileResourceArtifactIdFoundTargetNotExists
test-case.description: Verify that the receive message contains a 404, if there is no exisiting target

test-case.name: artifactForFileResourceSoftwareModuleFilenameFoundTargetExistsIsAssigned
test-case.description: Verify that the receive message contains a 200 and a artifact, if there is a existing artifct fpt the for the given softwareModuleFilename

test-case.name: fileResourceGetSha1InSecurityTokenIsNull
test-case.description: Verify that the receive message contains a 404 code,if the artifact could not found

test-case.name: artifactForFileResourceSoftwareModuleFilenameNotFound
test-case.description: Verify that the receive message contains a 404, if there is no artifact to the given softwareModuleFilename

test-case.name: artifactForFileResourceSHA1FoundTargetExistsIsAssigned
test-case.description: Verify that the receive message contains a 200 code and a artifact for the existing controller id

test-case.name: artifactForFileResourceSHA1NotFound
test-case.description: Verify that the receive message contains a 404 code, if there is no artifact for the given sha1

label.name: feature
label.value: Component Tests - Device Management Federation API
